ValidationRule.description: Changing Status from Closed to Reopened
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Closed"), NOT (ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Reopened"))), AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Reopened"), NOT (ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Closed"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We can only change the status from Closed to Reopen and Reopen to Closed
